com.rdupuis.amikcal.opengl

Class P3FT2FR4FVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rdupuis.amikcal.opengl.P3FT2FR4FVertex

  • public class P3FT2FR4FVertex
extends java.lang.Object
    This is not optimized (P3FT2FR4FVertex=>36octets) It is should be better to use RGBA int byte (but Painful). In C, it is trivial because we have pointers
